title: Everything that i want from a Avengers movie!!!!!
review: The Avengers is a MASTERPIECE to the recent Super Hero movies!This movie shows what exactly a CBM should be made!From visual effects to fight scenes,it's a piece of art!!Joss Whedon did a very good job at directing the movie!!And the Actors played so good,Specially Robert Downey Jr....you must see this.....the best in Avengers Quardilogy!!!
